replies.body: Legends say he wont get skins for years, but when he does 12 of them will come out at once
So he'll have 4*4 skins ... hmm, not a bad idea.
They gonna need to make 40 skins more at once so nothing is ruined.
i included the 4 skins he already has :p

>Jhin has four skins
_____________
> They gonna need to make 40 new skins
____________
>44*

40+4=44
44+4=48

44 new skins + 4 existing skins = 48
Wtf dude? I said i included the 4 skins jhin already had in my 44, it's not that hard to understand lol

You said that he needs 44 more skins. I dont know how you're gonna try and explain to me that you didnt say that when i can literally scroll up and see what you said, but you can always just admit that you made a mistake.
The 4 that he already has is included come on man you can do it
If only we could have FOURseen it....
We need an April Fool's skin where Jhin is obsessed with five instead of four, and just says "FIVE" every time he would say "FOUR"

wrong , Jhin has 5 , the original skin counts too.
Nah he needs a Nicolas Wolfwood Skin now {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
the fifth skin could be a legendary, he gets a legendary every 4 skins and after 40 it's an ultimate LOL
4 skins in enough for now i think. The skins are pretty dope too. Project and SKT are my favs

Well, the main options were/are:
4 skins, EVER. No new ones will be made after this point.
4 skins at a time > whenever a new skin is made, one of the old ones is instantly Vaulted
(no longer an option) Troll the crowd, and instead of a 4th skin, pull a "Lancer Blitzcrank" and jump from 3 straight to 5
